Class Monster

  • java.lang.Object
    • Unit
      • Monster
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Aggressive, Passive

    public abstract class Monster
extends Unit
    Represents the base class for all Monster sub-types in the game world.

      • Monster

        public Monster(int startX,
               int startY)
        throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Create a Monster and set the initial map position
        Parameters:
        startX - the starting x position of the Monster
        startY - the starting y position of the Monster
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException

    • Method Detail

      • chooseDir

        public void chooseDir(boolean random,
                      int avoid,
                      int dir)
        Select a direction to move a Monster or generate a random movement direction
        Parameters:
        random - use a random direction
        avoid - specify a direction to not choose (when choosing a random direction)
        dir - specify the direction to move

      • update

        public abstract void update(World world,
                            Player player,
                            int delta)
        Update the game state for a frame
        Parameters:
        world - the world the Monster is in
        player - the Player that is to be attacked
        delta - time passed since last frame (milliseconds)
